name: file-combine
description: Select and combine files and folders to merge into a single editor window, that can be copied into tools such as ChatGPT

fileCombine.llmInstructions.default: This document contains a collection of files from a software project. The content is organized with a processing summary, file structure, and the combined contents of each file, each in its own section.
fileCombine.llmInstructions.description: Custom instructions to describe the context of the combined files for an LLM.

fileCombine.showProcessingSummary.description: Show the main summary block (file counts, total size, estimated tokens).

fileCombine.showIgnoredFiles.description: Show the list of files that were ignored by .gitignore or .filecombine rules.

fileCombine.showTimings.description: Show the timings for each stage of the file combination process.

fileCombine.showFileStructure.description: Show the ASCII tree view of the processed file structure.

fileCombine.excludePatterns.description: Patterns for files and folders to always exclude from file combination.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
